content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. It's great that you're taking the time to prepare and ensure a smooth application process.

Remember to take your time, fill out the application carefully, and double-check your documents before submitting. If you have any questions or concerns, don't hesitate to reach out to the National Passport Information Center.

Once you've submitted your application, you can track the status online or by calling the National Passport Information Center. It's usually a good idea to apply for a passport renewal several months in advance of your trip to ensure you receive your new passport in time.

Safe travels, and I hope you have a wonderful trip to Seoul!
